thread.title: Manchester United's Anthony Martial thinks Jose Mourinho is trying to push him out of Old Trafford
thread.title_full: Manchester United's Anthony Martial thinks Jose Mourinho is trying to push him out of Old Trafford

author: Simon Mullock
title: Manchester United's Anthony Martial thinks Jose Mourinho is trying to push him out of Old Trafford

organizations.name: old trafford sport manchester united's anthony martial

text:
Sport Manchester United's Anthony Martial thinks Jose Mourinho is trying to push him out of Old Trafford The £58million forward feels he is being made a scapegoat for poor results by manager who rarely picks him Share Martial is often a sub or not selected at all — and PSG are keen to take him home to France (Photo: PA Wire) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Anthony Martial believes Jose Mourinho is attempting to drive him out of Manchester United . 
Winger Martial , signed in a £58million deal before last season, feels he has been made a scapegoat for his team’s failings this season after being repeatedly either omitted from the squad or put on the bench. 
And when Mourinho began the weekend by accusing his players of “lacking a winning mentality”, the 21-year-old believed the jibe was aimed at him. 
Paris Saint-Germain want to take the former Monaco star back to his native France – and United bosses are unlikely to stand in his way. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
